comment.author: Dejana
comment.text: Lindsey Marie ok you've got to laugh at this one ðŸ˜Š at least it's nice to see some glimpse of civility. They were both pretty funny! :-)

replies.author: Emmari
replies.text: Looks like you get the joke Dejana... could you please explain the joke? I don't get it. What's the hidden joke in Pardon Me? Thanks

replies.author: Dejana
replies.text: Emmari, the joke is in the irony that if Trump is elected, certainly- Clinton will need a Presidential "pardon" to escape her mountain of crimes and scandals. Get it?

replies.author: Torrey
replies.text: Dejana , THANK YOU!!! I must be a dimwit (albeit an adorable deplorable dimwit!) because I didn't get it either! ;)
